mapper.select:
SELECT PRODUCT, PART_NUMBER, CUSTOMER, PACKAGE_TYPE, PROCESS_CODE, TESTER_MODEL, MAIN_PROGRAM_NAME, TEMPERATURE, SBL_YIELD_LIMIT, SBL_SUBBIN_A_NUMBER, SBL_SUBBIN_A_LIMIT_PERCENT, SBL_SUBBIN_A_LIMIT_COUNT, SBL_SUBBIN_B_NUMBER, SBL_SUBBIN_B_LIMIT_PERCENT, SBL_SUBBIN_B_LIMIT_COUNT, FUNCTION_KEY1, FUNCTION_KEY2, FUNCTION_KEY3, FUNCTION_KEY4, FUNCTION_KEY5, FUNCTION_KEY6, FUNCTION_KEY7, FUNCTION_KEY8, FUNCTION_KEY9, FUNCTION_KEY10, FUNCTION_KEY11, FUNCTION_KEY12, FUNCTION_KEY13, FUNCTION_KEY14, FUNCTION_KEY15, FUNCTION_KEY16, FAB, GRADE, PROGRAM_VERSION, FIRMWARE_VERSION, TESTER_OS_VERSION, PARALLEL
PRODUCT = #{product},
PART_NUMBER = #{partNumber},
CUSTOMER = #{customer},
PACKAGE_TYPE = #{packageType},
PROCESS_CODE = #{processCode},
TESTER_MODEL = #{testerModel},
MAIN_PROGRAM_NAME = #{mainProgramName},
TEMPERATURE = #{temperature},
SBL_YIELD_LIMIT = #{sblYieldLimit},
SBL_SUBBIN_A_NUMBER = #{sblSubbinANumber},
SBL_SUBBIN_A_LIMIT_PERCENT = #{sblSubbinALimitPercent},
SBL_SUBBIN_A_LIMIT_COUNT = #{sblSubbinALimitCount},
SBL_SUBBIN_B_NUMBER = #{sblSubbinBNumber},
SBL_SUBBIN_B_LIMIT_PERCENT = #{sblSubbinBLimitPercent},
SBL_SUBBIN_B_LIMIT_COUNT = #{sblSubbinBLimitCount},
FUNCTION_KEY1 = #{functionKey1},
FUNCTION_KEY2 = #{functionKey2},
FUNCTION_KEY3 = #{functionKey3},
FUNCTION_KEY4 = #{functionKey4},
FUNCTION_KEY5 = #{functionKey5},
FUNCTION_KEY6 = #{functionKey6},
FUNCTION_KEY7 = #{functionKey7},
FUNCTION_KEY8 = #{functionKey8},
FUNCTION_KEY9 = #{functionKey9},
FUNCTION_KEY10 = #{functionKey10},
FUNCTION_KEY11 = #{functionKey11},
FUNCTION_KEY12 = #{functionKey12},
FUNCTION_KEY13 = #{functionKey13},
FUNCTION_KEY14 = #{functionKey14},
FUNCTION_KEY15 = #{functionKey15},
FUNCTION_KEY16 = #{functionKey16},
FAB = #{fab},
GRADE = #{grade},
PROGRAM_VERSION = #{programVersion},
FIRMWARE_VERSION = #{firmwareVersion},
TESTER_OS_VERSION = #{testerOsVersion},
PARALLEL = #{parallel}
mapper.insert:
MERGE INTO PROGRAM_REGISTER USING DUAL ON (PART_NUMBER=#{partNumber} AND PROCESS_CODE=#{processCode} AND TESTER_MODEL=#{testerModel}) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE
PRODUCT = #{product},
CUSTOMER = #{customer},
PACKAGE_TYPE = #{packageType},
MAIN_PROGRAM_NAME = #{mainProgramName},
TEMPERATURE = #{temperature},
SBL_YIELD_LIMIT = #{sblYieldLimit},
SBL_SUBBIN_A_NUMBER = #{sblSubbinANumber},
SBL_SUBBIN_A_LIMIT_PERCENT = #{sblSubbinALimitPercent},
SBL_SUBBIN_A_LIMIT_COUNT = #{sblSubbinALimitCount},
SBL_SUBBIN_B_NUMBER = #{sblSubbinBNumber},
SBL_SUBBIN_B_LIMIT_PERCENT = #{sblSubbinBLimitPercent},
SBL_SUBBIN_B_LIMIT_COUNT = #{sblSubbinBLimitCount},
FUNCTION_KEY1 = #{functionKey1},
FUNCTION_KEY2 = #{functionKey2},
FUNCTION_KEY3 = #{functionKey3},
FUNCTION_KEY4 = #{functionKey4},
FUNCTION_KEY5 = #{functionKey5},
FUNCTION_KEY6 = #{functionKey6},
FUNCTION_KEY7 = #{functionKey7},
FUNCTION_KEY8 = #{functionKey8},
FUNCTION_KEY9 = #{functionKey9},
FUNCTION_KEY10 = #{functionKey10},
FUNCTION_KEY11 = #{functionKey11},
FUNCTION_KEY12 = #{functionKey12},
FUNCTION_KEY13 = #{functionKey13},
FUNCTION_KEY14 = #{functionKey14},
FUNCTION_KEY15 = #{functionKey15},
FUNCTION_KEY16 = #{functionKey16},
FAB = #{fab},
GRADE = #{grade},
PROGRAM_VERSION = #{programVersion},
FIRMWARE_VERSION = #{firmwareVersion},
TESTER_OS_VERSION = #{testerOsVersion},
PARALLEL = #{parallel}
WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( PRODUCT, PART_NUMBER, CUSTOMER, PACKAGE_TYPE, PROCESS_CODE, TESTER_MODEL, MAIN_PROGRAM_NAME, TEMPERATURE, SBL_YIELD_LIMIT, SBL_SUBBIN_A_NUMBER, SBL_SUBBIN_A_LIMIT_PERCENT, SBL_SUBBIN_A_LIMIT_COUNT, SBL_SUBBIN_B_NUMBER, SBL_SUBBIN_B_LIMIT_PERCENT, SBL_SUBBIN_B_LIMIT_COUNT, FUNCTION_KEY1, FUNCTION_KEY2, FUNCTION_KEY3, FUNCTION_KEY4, FUNCTION_KEY5, FUNCTION_KEY6, FUNCTION_KEY7, FUNCTION_KEY8, FUNCTION_KEY9, FUNCTION_KEY10, FUNCTION_KEY11, FUNCTION_KEY12, FUNCTION_KEY13, FUNCTION_KEY14, FUNCTION_KEY15, FUNCTION_KEY16, FAB, GRADE, PROGRAM_VERSION, FIRMWARE_VERSION, TESTER_OS_VERSION, PARALLEL ) VALUES ( #{product}, #{partNumber}, #{customer}, #{packageType}, #{processCode}, #{testerModel}, #{mainProgramName}, #{temperature}, #{sblYieldLimit}, #{sblSubbinANumber}, #{sblSubbinALimitPercent}, #{sblSubbinALimitCount}, #{sblSubbinBNumber}, #{sblSubbinBLimitPercent}, #{sblSubbinBLimitCount}, #{functionKey1}, #{functionKey2}, #{functionKey3}, #{functionKey4}, #{functionKey5}, #{functionKey6}, #{functionKey7}, #{functionKey8}, #{functionKey9}, #{functionKey10}, #{functionKey11}, #{functionKey12}, #{functionKey13}, #{functionKey14}, #{functionKey15}, #{functionKey16}, #{fab}, #{grade}, #{programVersion}, #{firmwareVersion}, #{testerOsVersion}, #{parallel} )
